org.apache.ignite.ml.math.impls.vector

Class SingleElementVectorView

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.ml.math.impls.vector.AbstractVector
      • org.apache.ignite.ml.math.impls.vector.SingleElementVectorView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Externalizable, Serializable, Destroyable, MetaAttributes, StorageOpsMetrics, Vector

    public class SingleElementVectorView
extends AbstractVector
    Single value vector view over another vector.
